doc.previous: In the late 1980s American Airlines opened three hubs for north south traffic San Jose International Airport was added after American purchased AirCal American built a terminal and runway at Raleigh Durham International Airport for the growing Research Triangle Park nearby citation needed and to compete with USAir s hub in Charlotte Douglas International Airport Nashville International Airport was also added as a hub American also planned a north south hub at Stapleton International Airport in Denver during the mid 1980s but postponed those plans due to the planned development of Denver International Airport 31
